item.title: IonQ: Pioneering Trapped Ion Quantum Computing
item.description: Learn about IonQ, a company leading the charge in trapped ion quantum computing, offering high-performance quantum processors and cloud-based access to their systems.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)

item.title: Quantum Circuits, Inc. (QCI): Developing Superconducting Quantum Processors
item.description: Learn about Quantum Circuits, Inc. (QCI), a company dedicated to developing high-performance superconducting quantum processors and providing access to quantum computing through cloud services.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)

item.title: Rigetti Computing: Building Superconducting Quantum Computers
item.description: Explore Rigetti Computing, a company developing superconducting quantum computers and hybrid quantum-classical algorithms, making quantum computing accessible through their cloud services platform.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)
